findings.title: Wallet and Licence are incompatible with non-standard ERC20 tokens
findings.description: The TokenCard contracts are meant to work with any ERC20 token, but several high-profile ERC20 tokens do not correctly implement the ERC20 standard.

findings.title: Parsing large JSON integers could result in interoperability issues
findings.description: The parsing of strings as JSON integers differs from mainstream implementations.

findings.title: Base64 decoding does not validate its input
findings.description: The _base64decode function does not properly validate its input.

findings.title: Solidity compiler optimizations can be dangerous
findings.description: Optional Solidity compiler optimizations are enabled and may introduce security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Lack of contract existence check may mislead the user about the transactionâ€™s result
findings.description: A failure to check for a contract's existence may mislead a user into thinking that a failed transaction was successful.

findings.title: Contracts used as dependencies do not track upstream changes
findings.description: Third-party contracts or functions are copy-pasted and not updated reliably.

findings.title: No sanitization is performed when the Oraclize query is constructed
findings.description: An Oraclize URL query is not carefully constructed using the name of the token and can be manipulated.

findings.title: _licenceAmountScaled can be incorrectly initialized
findings.description: The licence contract's _licenceAmountScaled variable can be initialized with any unsigned integer value in the constructor.

findings.title: Multiplication overflow can block certain wallet operations
findings.description: Integer overflow in convertToEther and convertToStablecoin functions

findings.title: AddressWhitelist owner can be added to the whitelist
findings.description: Owner can be added to the whitelist by transferring ownership

findings.title: Date validation is insufficient and returns imprecise timestamps
findings.description: _verifyDate function does not properly validate its input

findings.title: Malicious price source can block withdrawal of funds
findings.description: Compromised CryptoCompare signing key can prevent transfers

findings.title: Daily limits may be bypassed via executeTransaction for certain tokens
findings.description: executeTransaction function allows bypassing daily limits using approve and transferFrom functions
